name: Dungeon Warfare (itch)
description:
Dungeon Warfare

is a hybrid tower defense strategy game where you have at your disposal more than 20 different kinds of deadly traps and contraptions to defend your dungeon against the greedy adventurers.

Instructions:

Game has in-game tutorial


[Hotkeys]

Map Scroll: W/A/S/D or Drag screen

Spacebar: Speed up/down the game

Right-click on a trap to sell it
